CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Labs relative to Crimson Analytics?
SRP.A: Echo Labs is {below} Crimson Analytics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Ventures relative to Crimson Analytics?
SRP.A: Starburst Ventures is {below} Crimson Analytics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Labs relative to Oracle Solutions?
SRP.A: Echo Labs is {below} Oracle Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total innovation index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Analytics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total innovation index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Echo Labs}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aether Tech's minimum Innovation Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aether Tech's minimum Innovation Index is in {1959}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst Ventures's minimum Innovation Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst Ventures's minimum Innovation Index is in {1960}.

NC.Q: Was the total Innovation Index in 1963 higher or lower than in 1967?
NC.A: The total innovation index in 1963 was {higher} than in 1967.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1965, was the average total Innovation Index higher or lower than between 1959 and 1965?
NC.A: The average total innovation index between 1961 and 1965 was {higher} than between 1959 and 1965.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1967, was the average total Innovation Index higher or lower than between 1967 and 1968?
NC.A: The average total innovation index between 1963 and 1967 was {lower} than between 1967 and 1968.

NC.Q: Was the total Innovation Index in 1959 higher or lower than in 1965?
NC.A: The total innovation index in 1959 was {lower} than in 1965.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Analytics} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Analytics and Starburst Ventures first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Analytics and Starburst Ventures did not exchange leading positions.
